text: Aba allahale timro bhara halka gardacha, usala'i ramrari thaha cha ki timima kehi kamajori cha. Tasartha yadi timra eka sayajana sanyami chan bhane uniharu du'isayamathi prabhavi rahanechan ra yadi timimadhye yasta eka hajara jana hunchan bhane allahako adesale uniharu du'ihajaramathi prabhavi rahanechan. Ra allaha dhairya garneharuko sathama cha
